summary: The module defines a collection of web request handlers that manage all aspects of user accounts in CKAN, including registration, login/logout, profile editing, password reset workflows, following other users, and API token creation and revocation, using Flask MethodView classes and CKAN's authentication and logic utilities.
business_intent: Provide the core functionality for user authentication, account lifecycle, profile maintenance, password recovery, and API access control so that portal users can securely create, manage, and interact with their accounts and authorized services.
